Comments
April 24, 2022
Bobcat2022
I’ve heard this figure disparaged with, well, he only has Super Senses, how are you going to keep him safe, what’s the rest of his defense. The “rest of his defense” is the other two hundred and forty (or more) points of Avengers that now also have Super Senses, in addition to whatever else those figures already had going on. That’s what “the rest of his defense” is. So he’s probably not the Miles you want for a Spider-Man Family team (they don’t need his help), but there are enough Miles options for that already. On Avengers squads (or his other keywords, I guess), it’s hard to imagine this one being surpassed anytime soon.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Woah, so for just 60 points you can give your entire Avengers team super senses their whole dial no matter where they are. That is incredibly powerful. You can even just hide him in the back and he's well worth his points. You probably will have to resist the temptation to send him into combat too because that trait is so awesome. Need to keep him alive.
